content.description:
Despite how short it, Wicked Quickie is pretty darn sustained and features fun movement.  After exiting left out of the cave, pull on side-pulls and pinches on slightly overhung rock to achieve the finish bucket.

This climb would deserve more stars were it not for its diminutive height and poor rock quality.  The blocky junk down low is eternally loose and the best right hand up 'high' features plenty of glue.
content.protection:
4 bolts to chains.  I unclipped the first bolt after reaching the second.

It also might make a better boulder problem if you want to bring pads.
content.location: The left-most climb that starts in the main cave. Only the first bolt is in the cave. The rest of the bolts are lined straight up the slightly overhung face left of the cave.

climbs.name: Totally Chawsome
climbs.fa: Dimitri Barton, D. Hatchett, Mike Hatchett, 90

content.description: 1 Move wonder.  Bouldery start to lie backs.  Crux at 2'nd bolt.  After clipping 3'rd bolt, pumpy moves to the top
content.location: To the rightmost side of the only cave.

content.description: Steep series of flakes that take the hardest, most direct line out the cave. Highest rating completed at Big Chief.
content.location: In between All Guns Blazing and Totally Chawsome, in the center of the cave.

content.description: Similar to the other cave problems, just with smaller holds and very dynamic movement.
content.location: Shares a start with All Guns Blazing, after clipping the 2nd bolt, stay left and more or less go directly up on severely overhanging cave features.

content.description: A very steep overhanging face with long sustained moves through the left side of a large cave. The crux is the first few moves which lead to "easier" 5.12 climbing. Be prepared for a serious pump.
content.protection:
This route is a sport route with 5 bolts and a bolted anchor at the top.

There is a rock near the bottom of this route with a bolt on it for belayers to clip into. Highly recommended as a climber falling early could hit the ground and/or suck a belayer into the roof.
content.location: This route is located on the left lip of the giant cave when hiking to Wampam, Pow Wow, Rain Dance, etc. You get down by rapping the route or lowering off.

content.description: A logical connection that connects "Blazing Buckets" into the finish of "A Vulgar Display of Power." Basically, a much harder finish to Blazing Buckets. Short and powerful.
content.location: Climb the first four bolts of "Blazing Buckets" to the jug flake then traverse left into the last two bolts of "Vulgar Display of Power."
